hackathon-description-text: begins this Saturday, April 22, 2017. Texas Southern University will be hosting its first ever hackathon. Join the creative, innovative group of students for 24 amazing hours of hacking in Houston, Texas. We are inviting all students to come build cool gadgets, develop slick software projects, solve challenges, network, collect free swag and win big prizes.
hackathon-rules:
All projects must be built from scratch during the event. Read through and accept our 
. Obviously, alcohol, drugs, firearms, knives, weapons (including toys) are strictly prohibited.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $50 Amazon Gift Vouchers per member of a team for the best hack/website submitted on a .tech domain. (Site should be functional)
4 Arduino Kits and 4 $1,000 Merit Scholarships to Bytecamp.
The Best Use of Amazon Web Services will receive $250 in AWS credit.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Amazon Web Services

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=3100 Cleburne St, Houston, TX 77004, USA
hackathon-location-description: Texas Southern University, Student Recreation Center
